ygData.subject: Re: Learning Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: The spamming works.. Allow the spamming to continue until you no longer get the your language skill has approved message.  You wont see any changes to your
ygData.messageBody:
The spamming works..

Allow the spamming to continue until you no longer get the "your language
skill has approved" message. You wont see any changes to your skills
listing until you zone. It seems that the person that is teaching you must
have excellent skill for that language. Hope that helps. Currently i know
21 different languages.. im only excellent in Eurdin, Old Eurdin, Elfish
and Barbarian.. the rest i can only ask where the bathroom in.. hehe

Hope that helps

-----Original Message-----
From: Cillo, Christopher L. [mailto:CLCILLO@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 9:02 AM
To: 'EverQuest'; 'Innoruuk List'
Subject: [EverQuest] Learning Languages


From: "Cillo, Christopher L." <CLCILLO@...>

Has anyone had any luck with teaching them to another player? I went ahead
and trained in several, and now I have 11 different languages, this includes
Common and Elf. Do you need to put more than one point in it to learn it
from someone else? Or to teach it to someone else? I grouped with someone
that wanted to work on it, so we gave it a try. Made a key that said several
lines to the group and spammed each other. I saw the blue message that your
language skills have improved several times but did not seem to see any
change in the language on the skill list. Also, when I right click to change
what language that I am talking in and click the choice to scroll threw
them, Dark Elf shows up on the list of choices, but when I look at my skill
list it is not there. Any ideas?

Thanks,

Chris aka Thunderheart lvl 16 Wood-Elf Druid Innoruuk server
